Verses: 1 dhevane, Raajaavukku Ummudaiya Niyaayaththeerppugalaiyum, Raajaavin Kumaaranukku Ummudaiya Needhiyaiyum Koduththarulum.
2 avar Ummudaiya Janangalai Needhiyodum, Ummudaiya Ezhaigalai Niyaayaththodum Visaarippaar.
3 parvadhangal Janaththirkuch Samaadhaanaththaith Tharum, Medugal Needhiyin Vilaivodirukkum.
4 janaththil Sirumaippadugiravargalai Avar Niyaayam Visaariththu, Ezhaiyin Pillaigalai Ratchiththu, Idukkan Seygiravanai Norukkuvaar.
5 sooriyanum Sandhiranum Ullamattum, Avargal Umakkuth Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaagap Bayandhiruppaargal.
6 pullaruppunda Veliyinmel Peyyum Mazhaiyaippolavum, Boomiyai Nanaikkum Thooralaippolavum Iranguvaar.
7 avarudaiya Naatkalil Needhimaan Sezhippaan; Sandhiranullavaraikkum Migundha Samaadhaanam Irukkum.
8 oru Samuththiranthodangi Marusamuththiramvaraikkum, Nadhithodangi Boomiyin Ellaigalvaraikkum Avar Arasaaluvaar.
9 vanaandharaththaar Avarukku Munbaagak Kunindhu Vananguvaargal; Avarudaiya Saththurukkal Mannai Nakkuvaargal.
10 tharsheesin Raajaakkalum Theevugalin Raajaakkalum Kaanikkaigalaik Konduvaruvaargal; Shebaavilum Sebaavilumulla Raajaakkal Vegumaanangalaik Konduvaruvaargal.
11 sagala Raajaakkalum Avaraip Panindhukolvaargal; Sagala Jaadhigalum Avaraich Sevippaargal.
12 kooppidugira Eliyavanaiyum, Udhaviyatra Sirumaiyaanavanaiyum Avar Viduvippaar.
13 balaveenanukkum Eliyavanukkum Avar Irangi, Eliyavargalin Aaththumaakkalai Ratchippaar.
14 avargal Aaththumaakkalai Vanjagaththirkum Kodumaikkum Thappuvippaar; Avargaludaiya Raththam Avarudaiya Paarvaikku Arumaiyaayirukkum.
15 avar Pizhaiththiruppaar, Shebaavin Pon Avarukkuk Kodukkappadum; Avarnimiththam Idaividaamal Jebampannappadum, Ennaalum Sthoththirikkappaduvaar.
16 boomiyile Malaigalin Uchchigalil Oru Pidi Dhaaniyam Vidhaikkappattirukkum; Adhin Vilaivu Leebanonaippola Asaiyum; Boomiyin Pullaippola Nagaraththaar Sezhiththonguvaargal.

17 avarudaiya Naamam Endrendraikkum Irukkum; Sooriyanullamattum Avarudaiya Naamam Sandhaana Parambaraiyaai Nilaikkum; Manushar Avarukkul Aaseervadhikkappaduvaargal, Ellaa Jaadhigalum Avaraip Baakkiyamudaiyavar Endru Vaazhththuvaargal.
18 isravelin Dhevanaayirukkira Karththaraagiya Dhevanukku Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga; Avare Adhisayangalaich Seygiravar.
19 avarudaiya Magimaiporundhiya Naamaththukku Endrendraikkum Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga; Boomimuzhuvadhum Avarudaiya Magimaiyaal Niraindhiruppadhaaga. Aamen, Aamen.
20 eesaayin Puththiranaagiya Thaaveedhin Vinnappangal Mudindhadhu.
